guis

Class EditorCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • guis.MyCanvas
            • guis.EditorCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class EditorCanvas
extends MyCanvas
    This is the canvas for the editor. It shows the game map in its current state. A drawer and a mouse listener always updates the map and the drawn image to the user.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
